verses.verse: But there shall be no more gloom <S%H4155><s%> for her who was in anguish. <S%H4164><s%> In <S%H6256><s%> the former time, <S%H7223><s%> he brought into contempt <S%H7043><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Naphtali; <S%H5321><s%> but in the latter <S%H314><s%> time he has made it glorious, <S%H3513><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> Galilee <S%H1551><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> who walked <S%H1980><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> light. <S%H216><s%> Those who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the shadow of death, <S%H6757><s%> on them the light <S%H216><s%> has shined. <S%H5050><s%>

You have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> the nation. <S%H1471><s%> You have increased <S%H1431><s%> their joy. <S%H8057><s%> They rejoice <S%H8057><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you according to the joy <S%H8057><s%> in harvest, <S%H7105><s%> as men rejoice <S%H1523><s%> when they divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil. <S%H7998><s%>

For the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of his burden, <S%H5448><s%> and the staff <S%H4294><s%> of his shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> the rod <S%H7626><s%> of his oppressor, <S%H5065><s%> you have broken <S%H2865><s%> as in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>

For all the armor <S%H5430><s%> of the armed man <S%H5431><s%> in the noisy <S%H7494><s%> battle, <S%H8071><s%> and the garments rolled <S%H1556><s%> in blood, <S%H1818><s%> will be for burning, <S%H8316><s%> fuel <S%H3980><s%> for the fire. <S%H784><s%>

For to us a child <S%H3206><s%> is born. <S%H3205><s%> To us a son <S%H1121><s%> is given; <S%H5414><s%> and the government <S%H4951><s%> will be on his shoulders. <S%H7926><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> will be called <S%H7121><s%> Wonderful, <S%H6382><s%> Counselor, <S%H3289><s%> Mighty <S%H1368><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> Everlasting <S%H5703><s%> Father, <S%H1><s%> Prince <S%H8269><s%> of Peace. <S%H7965><s%>

Of the increase <S%H4766><s%> of his government <S%H4951><s%> and of peace <S%H7965><s%> there shall be no end, <S%H7093><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and on his kingdom, <S%H4467><s%> to establish <S%H3559><s%> it, <S%H4941><s%> and to uphold it with justice <S%H4941><s%> and with righteousness <S%H6666><s%> from that time on, <S%H5704><s%> even forever. <S%H5769><s%> The zeal <S%H7068><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> will perform this. <S%H6213><s%>
The Lord <S%H136><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> into Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and it falls <S%H5307><s%> on Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

All the people <S%H5971><s%> will know, <S%H3045><s%> including Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> who say <S%H559><s%> in pride <S%H1346><s%> and in arrogance <S%H1346><s%> of heart, <S%H3824><s%>

"The bricks <S%H3843><s%> have fallen, <S%H5307><s%> but we will build <S%H1129><s%> with cut stone. <S%H1496><s%> The sycamore <S%H8256><s%> fig trees have been cut down, <S%H1438><s%> but we will put cedars <S%H730><s%> in their place. <S%H2498><s%>"

Therefore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will set up <S%H7682><s%> on high against him the adversaries <S%H6862><s%> of Rezin, <S%H7526><s%> and will stir <S%H5526><s%> up <S%H5526><s%> his enemies, <S%H341><s%>

The Syrians <S%H758><s%> in front, <S%H6924><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> behind; <S%H268><s%> and they will devour <S%H398><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with open mouth. <S%H6310><s%> For all this, <S%H639><s%> his anger is not turned away, <S%H7725><s%> but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out still. <S%H5186><s%>
Yet the people <S%H5971><s%> have not turned <S%H7725><s%> to him who struck <S%H5221><s%> them, <S%H1875><s%> neither have they sought Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

Therefore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from Israel <S%H3478><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> and tail, <S%H2180><s%> palm branch <S%H3712><s%> and reed, <S%H100><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

The elder <S%H2205><s%> and the honorable <S%H6440><s%> man <S%H1931><s%> is the head, <S%H7218><s%> and the prophet <S%H5030><s%> who teaches <S%H3384><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> is the tail. <S%H2180><s%>
For those who lead <S%H833><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> lead them astray; <S%H8582><s%> and those who are led <S%H833><s%> by them are destroyed. <S%H1104><s%>

Therefore the Lord <S%H136><s%> will not rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over their young men, <S%H970><s%> neither will he have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on their fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widows; <S%H490><s%> for everyone is profane <S%H2611><s%> and an evildoer, <S%H7489><s%> and every mouth <S%H6310><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> folly. <S%H5039><s%> For all this his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned away, <S%H7725><s%> but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out still. <S%H5186><s%>

For wickedness <S%H7564><s%> burns <S%H1197><s%> like a fire. <S%H784><s%> It devours <S%H398><s%> the briers <S%H8068><s%> and thorns; <S%H7898><s%> yes, <S%H3341><s%> it kindles in the thickets <S%H5442><s%> of the forest, <S%H3293><s%> and they roll upward <S%H55><s%> in a column <S%H1348><s%> of smoke. <S%H6227><s%>

Through the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is burnt <S%H6272><s%> up; <S%H5971><s%> and the people are the fuel <S%H3980><s%> for the fire. <S%H784><s%> No one <S%H376><s%> spares <S%H2550><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%>

One will devour <S%H1504><s%> on the right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and be hungry; <S%H7457><s%> and he will eat <S%H398><s%> on the left hand, <S%H8040><s%> and they will not be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%> Everyone <S%H376><s%> will eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his own arm: <S%H2220><s%>

Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> and they together <S%H3162><s%> shall be against Judah. <S%H3063><s%> For all this his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned away, <S%H7725><s%> but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out still. <S%H5186><s%>
